docs.abstract: In this lesson, students investigate the relationships between health care, socioeconomic class, racial background and life expectancy in America and create public awareness campaigns designed to inform people about specific health risks that are known to lower life expectancy.

byline.original: By CATHERINE HUTCHINGS and JAVAID KHAN

docs.lead_paragraph: Note: This lesson was originally published on an older version of The Learning Network; the link to the related Times article will take you to a page on the old site.

headline.sub: Virus? Bacteria? Environmental toxin? Scientists race to diagnose a syndrome that is threatening an entire species.;
headline.print_headline: Bats Perish, and No One Knows Why
headline.main: Bats Perish, and No One Knows Why

docs.lead_paragraph: Virus? Bacteria? Environmental toxin? Scientists are racing to diagnose a syndrome that is threatening several bat species.
docs.snippet: Virus? Bacteria? Environmental toxin? Scientists are racing to diagnose a syndrome that is threatening several bat species.

headline.main: Answers About Health in New York

docs.abstract: Answers from James R. Knickman, the president and chief executive of the New York State Health Foundation, who is taking questions from readers this week about health coverage, public health problems and a range of related issues.
docs.lead_paragraph: Following is a first set of answers from James R. Knickman, the president and chief executive of the New York State Health Foundation, who is taking questions from readers through March 29 on a range of issues from universal health care and Medicaid to the prevalence in New York of problems like obesity, diabetes, smoking and substance abuse. Readers are invited to submit additional questions using the comment form below.
docs.snippet: Answers from James R. Knickman, the president and chief executive of the New York State Health Foundation, who is taking questions from readers this week about health coverage, public health problems and a range of related issues.
